title: SimpleNotes
description: Shared notes and checklists for households. React frontend, FastAPI on Lambda, DynamoDB. Whole stack is Terraform'd and deployed via GitHub Actions. Built it to learn AWS serverless end to end.

title: BabyLog
description: Baby tracker — feedings, diapers, sleep, milestones. FastAPI backend on Lambda with SQLAlchemy, React PWA frontend with offline support. Another Terraform + AWS learning project.

title: HeyVoice
description: Voice cloning app using Qwen3-TTS. Upload a voice sample, generate speech in 10 languages. Runs inference on a local Mac Mini M4, so no GPU cloud bill. FastAPI + React + Stripe.

title: USD Lint
description: Linter for .usda files — catches naming violations, bad composition arcs, missing defaultPrim, that kind of thing. Rust PEG parser, no USD SDK needed. Outputs to terminal, JSON, or GitHub Actions.

title: Rosewood UI
description: Design system I use across my projects. CSS component library with React and PySide6/Qt wrappers, so I can share the same look between web apps and DCC tool GUIs.

title: Anvil
description: Package manager for VFX pipelines, written in Rust. Resolves YAML-based package definitions and launches DCCs with the right environment variables. Basically a simpler, faster Rez.

title: OpenGrid
description: Simple production tracker — the kind of thing you'd build when ShotGrid is too heavy for your team. Python SDK backed by SQLite, FastAPI server, React dashboard.

title: USD Asset Resolver
description: USD AR2 resolver plugin. Parses asset:// URIs, resolves versions from a SQLite database, caches results. Rust core with PyO3 bindings. Includes a PySide6 browser for browsing assets visually.
